nodes.text: A B1 battle droid served in the droid army of the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars. He was stationed on Rugosa during a battle as part of Asajj Ventress' forces.

In 22 BBY, This battle droid was sent out with a ground team to find Jedi Master Yoda. After a fellow droid noticed Yoda, this droid told his companions to shoot at the Jedi and then to split up into squads. The entire group was eventually cut down by Yoda.
Like all B1 battle droids, he stood at 1.93 meters tall and had masculine programing. He sported bone-white colored plating and was equipped with an E-5 blaster rifle.

His first and only appearance was in "Ambush", the first episode of the animated television series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' first season, which originally aired on October 3, 2008. He was voiced by Matthew Wood.
